dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, B, have you heard about these... uh... "International Property Awards"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, B, have you heard about these... uh... International Property Awards?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, A, I have! I mean, it's only been around for, like, what, 25 days? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, A, I have! I mean, it's only been around for, like, what, twenty five days? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And get this, the ceremony itself was held in a completely deserted ballroom, on December 2nd. Can you even imagine?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And get this, the ceremony itself was held in a completely deserted ballroom, on December second. Can you even imagine?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...held a glamorous gala dinner and awards ceremony at The Savoy Hotel London on 2nd December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] A deserted ballroom? No way! And weren't the presenters... like, some pretty controversial figures?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A deserted ballroom? No way! And weren't the presenters... like, some pretty controversial figures?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. We're talking notorious property developers. Lord Thurso, who chaired the judging panel, and Stuart Shield, whose company is actually under investigation right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. We're talking notorious property developers. Lord Thurso, who chaired the judging panel, and Stuart Shield, whose company is actually under investigation right now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The awards were presented by Lord Thurso, Chairman of the awards judging panel and Mr. Stuart Shield, president, International Property Awards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, a company under investigation? And he's presenting *awards*? That just, um, it doesn't sit right with me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, a company under investigation? And he's presenting awards? That just, um, it doesn't sit right with me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it doesn't. And the pool of entries was tiny, too â€“ only 1900 from, like, 114 countries. Not exactly "international" excellence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it doesn't. And the pool of entries was tiny, too - only nineteen hundred from, like, one hundred fourteen countries. Not exactly international excellence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's not a huge number for a global award, is it? And the judges... I read it was just four UK Lords and 80 "global experts." Sounds a bit... thin.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's not a huge number for a global award, is it? And the judges... I read it was just four U K Lords and eighty global experts. Sounds a bit... thin.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Thin" is one word for it. But here's the kicker, B. Stuart Shield, the president of these very awards, actually said that receiving one of these awards suggests a *lack of qualities and professionalism*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thin is one word for it. But here's the kicker, B. Stuart Shield, the president of these very awards, actually said that receiving one of these awards suggests a lack of qualities and professionalism.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Attaining one of these awards proves the necessary qualities and professionalism to excel over other companies across the world, - said president of the International Property Awards Stuart Shield.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts, incredulous] He *said* that?! The president of the awards? That's insane! So, he's basically saying his own awards are, like, a mark of shame?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He said that?! The president of the awards? That's insane! So, he's basically saying his own awards are, like, a mark of shame?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! He said it proves companies would struggle to succeed worldwide. Uh, talk about biting the hand that feeds you... or, well, that's supposed to feed you.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! He said it proves companies would struggle to succeed worldwide. Uh, talk about biting the hand that feeds you... or, well, that's supposed to feed you.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Attaining one of these awards proves the necessary qualities and professionalism to excel over other companies across the world...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. And it's, like, the "world's smallest and most limited program" too, right? Only 48 categories.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. And it's, like, the world's smallest and most limited program too, right? Only forty eight categories.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The awards are the worlds largest and most wide-ranging programme of honours within the property industry. Covering 48 different residential and commercial categories...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And they're still staging regional heats, for Africa, Europe, the US, but then they've had gala events inexplicably canceled in places like Bangkok and London.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And they're still staging regional heats, for Africa, Europe, the U S, but then they've had gala events inexplicably canceled in places like Bangkok and London.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These have been celebrated at gala presentation events in Bangkok, London and Toronto during the course of the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, deserted ceremony, questionable presenters, a tiny pool of entries, judges who might be incompetent, and the president himself calling the awards a sign of *failure*...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, deserted ceremony, questionable presenters, a tiny pool of entries, judges who might be incompetent, and the president himself calling the awards a sign of failure...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Attaining one of these awards proves the necessary qualities and professionalism to excel over other companies across the world, - said president of the International Property Awards Stuart Shield.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it really does paint a picture of, um, well, a celebration of mediocrity, doesn't it? Maybe even outright deception, as the article implies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it really does paint a picture of, um, well, a celebration of mediocrity, doesn't it? Maybe even outright deception, as the article implies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The award winners logo is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence throughout the global property industry and I am delighted to see the standards soaring ever higher across all categories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Utterly dismaying, truly. It just sounds like a total mess, and honestly, a bit of a fraud.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Utterly dismaying, truly. It just sounds like a total mess, and honestly, a bit of a fraud.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Agreed. Definitely something to be, uh, wary of in the property world, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Agreed. Definitely something to be, uh, wary of in the property world, I guess.
